participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Sociable and laid-back with a good sense of humor.
participant_1.background: i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Cynical yet humorous, often finds solace in light-hearted banter.
participant_2.background: i'm 40 years old. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce. i work as a car salesman.
